# items

**Instance Property**

The items that the template displays.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var items: [CPInformationItem] { get set }
```

## Discussion

Assign a new array to this property to update the items that the template displays. The template can display 10 items maximum. If the array contains more items, the template uses only the first 10.

## Managing the Items

- **CPInformationItem**: A data object that provides content for an information template.
- **CPInformationRatingItem**: A data object that provides rated content for an information template.
